<Link id="l00054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="54" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-amdgpuigrouplp-cpp-/#a3d40676e5e57853409fe62202f2bf3a3"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/cl/opt">cl::opt&lt;bool&gt;</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-amdgpuigrouplp-cpp-/#a3d40676e5e57853409fe62202f2bf3a3">UseCostHeur</a>(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="55"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;amdgpu-igrouplp-exact-solver-cost-heur&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/cl/#ac12e6a8f3a1b511f0dee2ed6de0ae806">cl::init</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">), <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/cl/#a68075925a54790e71ca790e1d4f21a40a263ac008d8d31f13ce460395fc4cf7e6">cl::Hidden</a>,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="56"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/cl/desc">cl::desc</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Whether to use the cost heuristic to make choices as we &quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="57"><Highlight kind="normal">             </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;traverse the search space using the exact solver. Defaulted &quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="58"><Highlight kind="normal">             </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;to on, and if turned off, we will use the node order -- &quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="59"><Highlight kind="normal">             </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;attempting to put the later nodes in the later sched groups. &quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="60"><Highlight kind="normal">             </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Experimentally, results are mixed, so this should be set on a &quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="244"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="245"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The PipelineSolver is used to assign SUnits to SchedGroups in a pipeline</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="246"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// in non-trivial cases. For example, if the requested pipeline is</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="247"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// &#123;VMEM&#95;READ, VALU, MFMA, VMEM&#95;READ&#125; and we encounter a VMEM&#95;READ instruction</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="248"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// in the DAG, then we will have an instruction that can not be trivially</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="249"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// assigned to a SchedGroup. The PipelineSolver class implements two algorithms</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="250"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// to find a good solution to the pipeline -- a greedy algorithm and an exact</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="251"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// algorithm. The exact algorithm has an exponential time complexity and should</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="252"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// only be used for small sized problems or medium sized problems where an exact</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="253"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// solution is highly desired.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00254" /><CodeLine lineNumber="254" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-amdgpuigrouplp-cpp-/pipelinesolver"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-amdgpuigrouplp-cpp-/pipelinesolver/#a2e443cb2a79734118f0b9a4f8ac5847e">PipelineSolver</a> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00465" /><CodeLine lineNumber="465"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00466" /><CodeLine lineNumber="466"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Group = &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00467" /><CodeLine lineNumber="467"><Highlight kind="normal">    AddedCost += Group.link(&#42;SU, MakePred, AddedEdges);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00468" /><CodeLine lineNumber="468"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(AddedCost &gt;= 0);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00473" /><CodeLine lineNumber="473"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> PipelineSolver::addEdges(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00474" /><CodeLine lineNumber="474"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl&lt;SchedGroup&gt;</a> &amp;SyncPipeline, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit">SUnit</a> &#42;SU, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> SGID,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00475" /><CodeLine lineNumber="475"><Highlight kind="normal">    std::vector&lt;std::pair&lt;SUnit &#42;, SUnit &#42;&gt;&gt; &amp;AddedEdges) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00476" /><CodeLine lineNumber="476"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00477" /><CodeLine lineNumber="477"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// For IsBottomUp, the first SchedGroup in SyncPipeline contains the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00478" /><CodeLine lineNumber="478"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// instructions that are the ultimate successors in the resultant mutation.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00479" /><CodeLine lineNumber="479"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Therefore, in such a configuration, the SchedGroups occurring before the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00480" /><CodeLine lineNumber="480"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// candidate SGID are successors of the candidate SchedGroup, thus the current</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00481" /><CodeLine lineNumber="481"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// SU should be linked as a predecessor to SUs in those SchedGroups. The</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00482" /><CodeLine lineNumber="482"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// opposite is true if !IsBottomUp. IsBottomUp occurs in the case of multiple</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00483" /><CodeLine lineNumber="483"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// SCHED&#95;GROUP&#95;BARRIERS, or if a user specifies IGLP&#95;OPT SchedGroups using</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00484" /><CodeLine lineNumber="484"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// IsBottomUp (in reverse).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00485" /><CodeLine lineNumber="485"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> IsBottomUp ? linkSUnit(SU, SGID, AddedEdges, SyncPipeline.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#a23aab542398091e1fcfd46b6006d64ac">rbegin</a>(),</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00486" /><CodeLine lineNumber="486"><Highlight kind="normal">                                SyncPipeline.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#ad696953257cf1c4e5bd12d02146e7287">rend</a>())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00487" /><CodeLine lineNumber="487"><Highlight kind="normal">                    : linkSUnit(SU, SGID, AddedEdges, SyncPipeline.<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sandboxir/#a2fdb10193ae65fe59b4d8df288044864">begin</a>(),</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00488" /><CodeLine lineNumber="488"><Highlight kind="normal">                                SyncPipeline.<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sandboxir/#a64ac61287490361f2183faf1d7639ee9">end</a>());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00489" /><CodeLine lineNumber="489"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00700" /><CodeLine lineNumber="700"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> PipelineSolver::greedyFind(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00701" /><CodeLine lineNumber="701"><Highlight kind="normal">    std::vector&lt;std::pair&lt;SUnit &#42;, SUnit &#42;&gt;&gt; &amp;AddedEdges, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16isellowering-cpp/#a0acb682b8260ab1c60b918599864e2e5">T</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16isellowering-cpp/#a0acb682b8260ab1c60b918599864e2e5">T</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#abb2b3a60ccc38a28239e19a1646e0c8a">E</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00708" /><CodeLine lineNumber="708"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Fitting SU(&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;&lt; CurrSU.first-&gt;NodeNum</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00710" /><CodeLine lineNumber="710"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00711" /><CodeLine lineNumber="711"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Since we have added the potential SchedGroups from bottom up, but</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00712" /><CodeLine lineNumber="712"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// traversed the DAG from top down, parse over the groups from last to</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00713" /><CodeLine lineNumber="713"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// first. If we fail to do this for the greedy algorithm, the solution will</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00714" /><CodeLine lineNumber="714"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// likely not be good in more complex cases.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00762" /><CodeLine lineNumber="762"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">while</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static&#95;cast&lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">size&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">&gt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(CurrSyncGroupIdx) &lt; PipelineInstrs.size()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00763" /><CodeLine lineNumber="763"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-amdgpuigrouplp-cpp-/#a1e390aa8a87f7ce31b70e71065173974">SUToCandSGsPair</a> CurrSU = PipelineInstrs&#91;CurrSyncGroupIdx&#93;&#91;CurrConflInstNo&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1079"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Whether or not the instruction has greater than or equal to \\p Size</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1080"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// immediate successors. If \\p HasIntermediary is true, this tests also</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01506" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1506"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// How many MFMAs depend on a single bit pack operation</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01507" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1507"><Highlight kind="normal">  MFMAEnablement =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01508" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1508"><Highlight kind="normal">      std::count&#95;if(PackPred-&gt;getSUnit()-&gt;Succs.begin(),</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01509" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1509"><Highlight kind="normal">                    PackPred-&gt;getSUnit()-&gt;Succs.end(), &#91;&amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/hexagoncopytocombine-cpp/#a1d40004718218dbdf06b496766299101">TII</a>&#93;(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdep">SDep</a> &amp;Succ) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01510" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1510"><Highlight kind="normal">                      return TII-&gt;isMFMAorWMMA(&#42;Succ.getSUnit()-&gt;getInstr());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01511" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1511"><Highlight kind="normal">                    &#125;);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01512" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1512"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01513" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1513"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The number of MFMAs that depend on a single V&#95;EXP</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01514" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1514"><Highlight kind="normal">  MFMAEnablement &#42;= PackSuccCount;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01515" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1515"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01516" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1516"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The number of V&#95;EXPs required to resolve all dependencies for an MFMA</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01517" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1517"><Highlight kind="normal">  ExpRequirement =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01518" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1518"><Highlight kind="normal">      std::count&#95;if(ExpPipeCands.begin(), ExpPipeCands.end(),</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01519" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1519"><Highlight kind="normal">                    &#91;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">this</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">, &amp;PackPred&#93;(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit">SUnit</a> &#42;ExpBase) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01520" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1520"><Highlight kind="normal">                      return DAG-&gt;IsReachable(PackPred-&gt;getSUnit(), ExpBase);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01521" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1521"><Highlight kind="normal">                    &#125;);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01522" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1522"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01523" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1523"><Highlight kind="normal">  ExpRequirement &#42;= PackPredCount;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01524" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1524"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01705" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1705"><Highlight kind="normal">  SG-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-amdgpuigrouplp-cpp-/schedgroup/#a4aea1667f25dae0657fb81502aa11e29">initSchedGroup</a>(SyncedInstrs&#91;SG-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-amdgpuigrouplp-cpp-/schedgroup/#a0c0110e7049326bfe58cc58bc023a76e">getSyncID</a>()&#93;);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01706" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1706"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01707" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1707"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// PHASE 2: Main Interleave Loop</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01708" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1708"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01709" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1709"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The number of MFMAs per iteration</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01710" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1710"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> MFMARatio =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01711" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1711"><Highlight kind="normal">      MFMAEnablement &gt; ExpRequirement ? MFMAEnablement / ExpRequirement : 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01712" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1712"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The number of Exps per iteration</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01713" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1713"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ExpRatio =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01714" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1714"><Highlight kind="normal">      MFMAEnablement &gt; ExpRequirement ? 1 : ExpRequirement / MFMAEnablement;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01715" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1715"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The reamaining Exps</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01716" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1716"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> RemainingExp = TransPipeCount &gt; (2 &#42; ExpRequirement)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01717" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1717"><Highlight kind="normal">                              ? TransPipeCount - (2 &#42; ExpRequirement)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01718" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1718"><Highlight kind="normal">                              : 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01719" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1719"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ExpLoopCount = RemainingExp / ExpRatio;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01720" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1720"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// In loop MFMAs</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01721" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1721"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> MFMAInLoop = MFMAPipeCount &gt; (MFMAEnablement &#42; 2)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01722" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1722"><Highlight kind="normal">                            ? MFMAPipeCount - (MFMAEnablement &#42; 2)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01723" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1723"><Highlight kind="normal">                            : 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01724" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1724"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> MFMALoopCount = MFMAInLoop / MFMARatio;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01725" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1725"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> VALUOps =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01726" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1726"><Highlight kind="normal">      AddPipeCount &lt; MFMAPipeCount ? 1 : AddPipeCount / MFMAPipeCount;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01727" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1727"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> LoopSize = std::min(ExpLoopCount, MFMALoopCount);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01728" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1728"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01729" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1729"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = 0; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> &lt; LoopSize; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>++) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01730" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1730"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> &#42; ExpRatio % ExpRequirement))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01731" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1731"><Highlight kind="normal">      incrementTransPosition();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01732" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1732"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01733" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1733"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Round N MFMA</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01734" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1734"><Highlight kind="normal">    SG = &amp;SyncedSchedGroups&#91;PipelineSyncID&#93;.emplace&#95;back(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01735" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1735"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-amdgpuigrouplp-cpp-/#a09279cda31d6b1b9fb748d7f45d1345fafad0f3826ff232c44b55c89c333e115a">SchedGroupMask::MFMA</a>, MFMARatio, PipelineSyncID, <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-amdgpuigrouplp-cpp-/iglpstrategy/#aa732d05ffff7be6cbcdcc3895d2524c8">DAG</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-amdgpuigrouplp-cpp-/iglpstrategy/#a787d4f8409dfc44376a67ab93559b671">TII</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02359" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2359"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Add DAG edges that enforce SCHED&#95;BARRIER ordering.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02360" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2360"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> addSchedBarrierEdges(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit">SUnit</a> &amp;SU);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02361" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2361"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02362" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2362"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Use a SCHED&#95;BARRIER&#39;s mask to identify instruction SchedGroups that should</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02363" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2363"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// not be reordered accross the SCHED&#95;BARRIER. This is used for the base</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02364" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2364"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// SCHED&#95;BARRIER, and not SCHED&#95;GROUP&#95;BARRIER. The difference is that</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02365" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2365"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// SCHED&#95;BARRIER will always block all instructions that can be classified</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02366" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2366"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// into a particular SchedClass, whereas SCHED&#95;GROUP&#95;BARRIER has a fixed size</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02367" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2367"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// and may only synchronize with some SchedGroups. Returns the inverse of</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02368" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2368"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Mask. SCHED&#95;BARRIER&#39;s mask describes which instruction types should be</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02369" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2369"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// allowed to be scheduled across it. Invert the mask to get the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02370" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2370"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// SchedGroupMask of instructions that should be barred.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02371" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2371"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-amdgpuigrouplp-cpp-/#a09279cda31d6b1b9fb748d7f45d1345f">SchedGroupMask</a> invertSchedBarrierMask(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-amdgpuigrouplp-cpp-/#a09279cda31d6b1b9fb748d7f45d1345f">SchedGroupMask</a> Mask) </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02372" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2372"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02373" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2373"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Create SchedGroups for a SCHED&#95;GROUP&#95;BARRIER.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02375" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2375"><Highlight kind="normal">      std::vector&lt;SUnit&gt;::reverse&#95;iterator RIter);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02587" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2587"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Opc = R-&gt;getInstr()-&gt;getOpcode();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02588" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2588"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// SCHED&#95;&#91;GROUP&#95;&#93;BARRIER and IGLP are mutually exclusive.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02589" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2589"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Opc == AMDGPU::SCHED&#95;BARRIER) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02590" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2590"><Highlight kind="normal">      addSchedBarrierEdges(&#42;R);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02591" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2591"><Highlight kind="normal">      FoundSB = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02592" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2592"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Opc == AMDGPU::SCHED&#95;GROUP&#95;BARRIER) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02593" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2593"><Highlight kind="normal">      initSchedGroupBarrierPipelineStage(R);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02594" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2594"><Highlight kind="normal">      FoundSB = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02595" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2595"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Opc == AMDGPU::IGLP&#95;OPT) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02596" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2596"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!FoundSB &amp;&amp; !FoundIGLP) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02597" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2597"><Highlight kind="normal">        FoundIGLP = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02598" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2598"><Highlight kind="normal">        ShouldApplyIGLP = initIGLPOpt(&#42;R);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02599" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2599"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02600" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2600"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02601" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2601"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02602" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2602"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02603" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2603"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (FoundSB || (FoundIGLP &amp;&amp; ShouldApplyIGLP)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02604" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2604"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-amdgpuigrouplp-cpp-/pipelinesolver">PipelineSolver</a> PS(SyncedSchedGroups, SyncedInstrs, DAG, <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-amdgpuigrouplp-cpp-/igrouplpdagmutation/#aa8bd44794663b8902e4b22c16844aa13">IsBottomUp</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02605" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2605"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// PipelineSolver performs the mutation by adding the edges it</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02606" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2606"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// determined as the best</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02607" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2607"><Highlight kind="normal">    PS.<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-amdgpuigrouplp-cpp-/pipelinesolver/#a6d184606e7c5cd520ad70b17dde09c36">solve</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
